name: Unicorn Instinct 2 Demo
description:
There is no Unicorn Instinct 1.

You are the Unicorn Singularity that protects the UNIverse of the UNIcorn.

This is a "Platformer Game" and you are not limited to just a jump or double jump

Because you can jump infinitely!!

Game Concept:

PV

This game currently has 3 Chapters and 3 Endings

The final game will have 5 chapters.

Controls:

Use Arrow Keys to move.

Spamming UP and DOWN arrows to jump infinitely.

Press SHIFT to interact.

Press A to Punch.

Press S to Shoot.

Press D to Dash.

Feel free to provide me with any feedback!
